name: EVERYTHING MUST GO
description:
Things haven't been going well at Big Joe's Thing Shop and now it has to inevitably close down. It is up to you to sell the last 20 items at this store to the masses, try not to get trampled by the people crowding you trying to get a good sale. 

Controls + How to Play:

  • Use the Space Bar to Navigate Menus
  • Use Arrow Keys to Move
  • Go to store shelves to get an item
  • Press Space to fire the item at a customer (no aiming needed)
  • Repeat until you appease 20 customers :)

Credits: 

Code and Art: Cloud Studios

Music: Red Curtain by HorrorPen

Sound Effects: Mike Koening & Fesilyan Studios

Made for Ludum Dare 50 in 72 hours.
